title: Construction of Pre-Fabricated Buildings for the Police Department
decision_details: - with the return of normalcy in civilian life in the Northern and Eastern Provinces, the necessity has arisen for the establishment of new Police Stations to maintain law and order in areas where resettlement has taken place.  The proposal made by H.E. the President, in his capacity as the Minister of Defence and Urban Development, to award the construction of the above buildings to the Central Engineering Consultancy Bureau (CECB), was approved by the Cabinet.
